Rufflet

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
80 83 50 60 37 50 360
#186 0' 2.1"
23.15 lbs. 		Eaglet Pokémon With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Keen Eye 2 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
1 Sheer Force 15 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
18 Pressure 5 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
36 Inner Focus 2 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
54 Air Lock 3 Eliminates the effects of weather.
72 Defiant 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
90 Guts 15 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
100 Hustle 5 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 02 Pickup 1 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 04 Insomnia 2 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 17 Wind Rider 5 Blocks wind moves. Attack is boosted from Tailwind or when hit by a wind move.
Disc 18 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 25 Levitate 3 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 26 Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 31 Gale Wings 15 Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
Disc 46 Fog Veil 2 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in thick fog.
Disc 61 Unburden 5 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 15 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Aerilate 15 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Aerodynamic 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Blustery Terrain.
Air Lock 3 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Anticipation 1 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Big Pecks 2 Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
Competitive 3 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Defeatist -10 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Defiant 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
Early Bird 1 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
Emergency Exit -6 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Frisk 1 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Guts 15 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Hustle 5 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Inner Focus 2 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Keen Eye 2 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
Klutz -4 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Limber 2 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Mold Breaker 5 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Normalize 2 All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. Their power is boosted a little.
Pressure 5 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Quick Draw 3 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
Reckless 5 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sheer Force 15 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Skill Link 5 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Slow Start -3 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Speed Boost 5 Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
Stall -3 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steadfast 2 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
Technician 5 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Tough Claws 15 Powers up moves that make direct contact.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Vital Spirit 2 The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
Wind Power 2 When hit by a wind move, the Pokémon becomes Charged up.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
